contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Nemuro Subprefecture |native_name = 根室支庁 |official_name = Nemuro-shichō |image_map = Nemuro Subprefecture.png |seat = [[Nemuro, Hokkaidō|Nemuro]] |seat_type = Capital |subdivision_type = Prefecture |subdivision_name = [[Hokkaidō]] |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 3406.23 |area_footnotes = |population_total = 84035 |population_as_of = March 2009 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_density_km2 = auto |website = [http://www.nemuro.pref.hokkaido.lg.jp/ nemuro.pref.hokkaido.lg.jp] }} {{nihongo|'''Nemuro'''|根室振興局|Nemuro-shinkō-kyoku}} is a [[Subprefectures in Hokkaidō|subprefecture]] of [[Hokkaidō]], [[Japan]]. The Japanese claim the disputed [[Kuril Islands dispute|Southern Kurile Islands]] (known as the Northern Territories in Japan) as part of this subprefecture. As of July 31, 2004, the subprefecture has an estimated population of 86,152 and a (claimed) area of 8533.96 km². [[Nakashibetsu Airport]], the easternmost airport in Japan, is located in the Town of [[Nakashibetsu, Hokkaidō|Nakashibetsu]], [[Shibetsu District, Hokkaidō|Shibetsu District]]. == History == *November 1897: Nemuro Subprefecture established *November 1897: Shana Subprefecture established *December 1903: Shana Subprefecture and Nemuro Subprefecture merged *August 1945: [[Soviet Union|Soviets]] occupy the Kuril Islands == Geography == [[Image:Nemuro Subprefecture Map.gif|thumb|300px|Nemuro Subprefecture (under Japanese control)]] ===Cities=== * [[Nemuro, Hokkaidō|Nemuro]] (capital) ===Towns and villages by district=== * [[Menashi District, Hokkaidō|Menashi District]] ** [[Rausu, Hokkaidō|Rausu]] * [[Notsuke District, Hokkaidō|Notsuke District]] ** [[Betsukai, Hokkaidō|Betsukai]] * [[Shibetsu District, Hokkaidō|Shibetsu District]] ** [[Nakashibetsu, Hokkaidō|Nakashibetsu]] ** [[Shibetsu, Hokkaidō (Nemuro)|Shibetsu]] ===Districts in the Northern Territories=== :''Also known as the Southern Kuril Islands (administered by [[Russia]], claimed by Japan), see [[Kuril Islands dispute]].'' *[[Shikotan District, Hokkaidō|Shikotan]] ** [[Shikotan, Hokkaidō|Shikotan]] *[[Kunishiri District, Hokkaidō|Kunashiri]] ([[Kunashir]]) ** [[Tomari, Hokkaidō|Tomari]] ([[Golovnino]]) ** [[Ruyobetsu, Hokkaidō|Ruyobetsu]] ([[Yuzhno Kurilsk]]) *[[Etorofu District, Hokkaidō|Etorofu]] ([[Iturup]]) ** [[Rubetsu, Hokkaidō|Rubetsu]] ([[Pioner]]) *[[Shana District, Hokkaidō|Shana]] ** [[Shana, Hokkaidō|Shana]] ([[Kurilsk]]) *[[Shibetoro District, Hokkaidō|Shibetoro]] ** [[Shibetoro, Hokkaidō|Shibetoro]] ([[Rudnaya]]) ===Districts renounced in [[San Francisco Treaty]]=== [[Image:Nemuro Subprefecture Map (include Southern Chishima).gif|thumb|300px|Nemuro Subprefecture (including Southern Chishima)]] *[[Uruppu District, Hokkaidō|Uruppu]] ([[Urup]]) *[[Shimushiru District, Hokkaidō|Shimushiro]] ([[Simushir]]) *[[Shumushu District, Hokkaidō|Shumushu]] ([[Shumshu]]) ===Islands=== * [[Habomai]] Rocks * [[Shikotan]] Island * [[Kunashiri]] * [[Etorofu]] ([[Iturup]]) ===Mergers=== :''See [[List of mergers in Hokkaidō Prefecture#Nemuro Subprefecture]].'' ==External links== *{{jp icon}} [http://www.nemuro.pref.hokkaido.jp/ Official website]
